rdf:Property.rdfs:label: имеет условие
hat Zustand
a pour état matériel
has condition
έχει κατάσταση
tem estado material
有状态
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property records an E3 Condition State for some E18 Physical Thing. It is a shortcut of the more fully developed path from E18 Physical Thing through P34 concerned (was assessed by), E14 Condition Assessment P35 has identified (was identified by) to E3 Condition State. It offers no information about how and when the E3 Condition State was established, nor by whom. An instance of Condition State is specific to an instance of Physical Thing.
